alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead NRA, Colorado River-AZ side; Northwest Deserts, Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 17 at 10:49PM MST until June 18 at 9:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM PDT/MST TO 9 PM PDT/MST SATURDAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR MOST OF SOUTHERN NEVADA AND NORTHWEST ARIZONA... * AFFECTED AREA...In Nevada...Fire weather zones 461, 462, 463, 464, 465, and 466. In Arizona...Fire weather zones 101 and 102. * WIND...Winds have decreased and should remain less than 20 mph overnight, but will increase again Saturday morning. Sustained winds of 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 50 mph. Stronger wind gusts possible across the Southern Great Basin. * HUMIDITY...Minimum relative humidity values of 5 to 12 percent.Slight improvements to humidity values are possible in eastern Mohave County Saturday...but still in the 10 to 20 percent range. * IMPACTS...A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly.
info.instruction: Outdoor burning is not recommended. Heed all fire restrictions.

area.areaDesc: Lake Mead NRA, Colorado River-AZ side; Northwest Deserts, Northwest Plateau
